title.english: The Devil is a Part-Timer! Season 2

description:
The second season of Hataraku Maou-sama!

MgRonald’s best demon lord worker is back, climbing the corporate ladder to become ruler of Earth. But Maou’s plans of domination might need to be put on hold when a small girl claims to be his and Emi’s child!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: はたらく魔王さま！！2nd Season
title.english: The Devil is a Part-Timer! Season 2 Part 2

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

title.romaji: Yuusha ni Narenakatta Ore wa Shibushibu Shuushoku wo Ketsui Shimashita.
title.english: I Couldn’t Become a Hero, So I Reluctantly Decided to Get a Job.

title.romaji: Lv1 Maou to One Room Yuusha
title.english: Level 1 Demon Lord and One Room Hero

title.romaji: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
title.english: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

name.native: エミリア・ユスティーナ
